bio.name: Viktoria Gaiser
bio.title: AI Consultant
summary: I help teams ship practical AI features: assistants, RAG systems, and automation that integrate cleanly with existing products.
My focus is reliability: evaluation, guardrails, and deterministic content pipelines.
highlights: Production hardening: observability, cost control, safety

services.intro: Engagements are lightweight, focused, and oriented toward measurable outcomes.

services.name: RAG & Knowledge Assistants
services.description: Design and implementation of retrieval-augmented generation for internal docs, support, and operations.

services.name: Automation & Agent Tooling
services.description: Automate repetitive workflows with tool-using agents while keeping deterministic boundaries.

services.name: AI Product & Delivery
services.description: Go from idea to shipped feature with clear scope, timelines, and reliability targets.
